text: Allahvaiyanri (marravarrait tankalukku) patukavalarkalaka etuttuk kontavarkalin utaranam: Nulam pucci kattiya vittai(t tankal vacikka etuttuk kontavarkalin utaranattai) ottirukkiratu. Vitukalil ellam mikka palavinamanatu niccayamaka nulam pucciyin vitutan. (Nulam pucciyin vitu ivarkalai evvaru patukakka mutiyato avvare ivarkal tankalukku patukavalarkalaka etuttuk konta teyvankalum ivarkalai patukakka mutiyatu. Itai) avarkal arintu kolla ventume
